definition: an enlarged and muscular saclike organ of the alimentary canal, put up with something or somebody unpleasant
details:
noun
- an enlarged and muscular saclike organ of the alimentary canal
= synonyms: breadbasket
- the region of the body of a vertebrate between the thorax and the pelvis
= synonyms: belly
- an appetite for food
= example: an appetite for food
- an inclination or liking for things involving conflict or difficulty or unpleasantness
= example: an inclination or liking for things involving conflict or difficulty or unpleasantness
verb
- put up with something or somebody unpleasant
= synonyms: support
- bear to eat
= example: bear to eat
